genPwyPopup

public java.lang.String genPwyPopup(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> ids,
                                    java.lang.String taxonomyId,
                                    java.lang.String experimentId,
                                    java.lang.String sampleId)
Description copied from interface: GlammService
Generates the HTML for a pathway popup - the popup will contain a link back to the MicrobesOnline pathway page, which will include the microarray data overlay for the specified experiment and sample.

Specified by:
genPwyPopup in interface GlammService
Parameters:
ids - The set of ids for the pathways in this popup.
taxonomyId - The taxonomy id for the organism associated with this popup.
experimentId - The experiment id.
sampleId - The sample id.
Returns:
The popup HTML.

getDirections

public java.util.List<Pathway> getDirections(java.lang.String taxonomyId,
                                             Compound cpdSrc,
                                             Compound cpdDst,
                                             java.lang.String mapTitle,
                                             java.lang.String algorithm)
Description copied from interface: GlammService
Gets directions (i.e. retrosynthetic pathway routes) between the source and destination compounds.

Specified by:
getDirections in interface GlammService
Parameters:
taxonomyId - The taxonomy id for the organism.
cpdSrc - The source compound.
cpdDst - The destination compound.
mapTitle - The title of the map.
algorithm - The algorithm used to find these routes.
Returns:
A list of pathways.

populateOrganisms

public java.util.List<Organism> populateOrganisms(Sample.DataType dataType)
Description copied from interface: GlammService
Gets the list of available organisms with samples available for a given data type. The content of list is dependent on the access level of the user.

Specified by:
populateOrganisms in interface GlammService
Parameters:
dataType - The data type.
Returns:
The list of organisms, in alphabetical order by species name, with user-uploaded (session) organisms listed first.
